Compares the current instance with another object of the same type and returns an integer that indicates whether the current instance precedes, follows, or occurs in the same position in the sort order as the other object.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as . Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.

member.summary: Indicates whether the current object is equal to another object of the same type.
member.param: An object to compare with this object.
member.returns: if the current object is equal to the parameter; otherwise, .

member.summary: Indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.
member.param: The object to compare with the current instance.
member.returns: if and this instance are the same type and represent the same value; otherwise, .

member.summary: Returns the hash code for this instance.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that is the hash code for this instance.

member.summary: Returns the fully qualified type name of this instance.
member.returns: The fully qualified type name.
